movie_title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
title: A lovable movie
review: I really loved this movie. In the beginning, it was boring but then it started to provide mysteries. I didn't loose my attention until the very end. Wholly, it was a brilliant movie and i would recommend giving it a try.
